name: Trash Truck Thrash
description:
Slamming is a fun yet challenging.Trash Truck Thrash is a Demolition Derby style game that combines strategy, action and some physics.This is an ultimate destruction game here you score as you eliminate vehicles.Earn as much as you can by slamming and destroying trash trucks.
This tricky Destruction game really helps to exercise your quick reaction skills as there are so many Slammers to defeat. Think your strategy to stop these angry Trash Truckers from destroying you.
